summary: An ordinance granting to the Puget Sound Traction, Light and Power Company, its successors and assigns, the right to construct, maintain and operate a side track beginning at the intersection of Second Avenue West and West Mercer Street, making suitable connection with existing tracks of the Puget Sound Traction, Light and Power Company on West Mercer Street; thence along Second aw to West Roy Street, making connection with existing tracks of Puget Sound Traction, Light and Power Company on West Roy Street.
